post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
Dear Travis
I am writing to see if you might be interested in one of the following contract positions. One of the banks downtown is looking for 2 contractors to work as testers on their web applications.
The first position is for a fully bilingual (french/english) tester - the start date is from January 23rd to March 14th and the hourly rate for someone who is incorporated is $35ph maximum.
The second position is for a functional Tester of various web based applications and the pay is $20ph. This is working in the same department and the contract runs from January 23rd to March 14th.
If you are interested and qualified for either of the above positions please let me know. Alternatively if you know of someone who would be looking please have them call me.
Many thanks for your time
Stephen
Stephen Carrette Recruiter modis 416 492 5656 extension 232 www.modisit.com
Good luck to anyone who may be interested
post.title: Tester contract position from Modis
